name: Secure The Earth
description:
I am a single Game Developer. The complete game has been made by my self in 4 days.

Secure The Earth From Monsters

The little monsters have made an attack on the earth and are trying to  destroy and corrupt the earth. Our mission is to kill these monsters and to protect and save the earth from the terror of these monsters. 

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.

-All sounds are sourced from Retro8BitSounds from Epic Market.

-Low Poly Assets are taken from  Jayanam You-tube channel free assets.

Trees, stone, flowers etc,

AnimStarter Pack From Epic

Character and monsters are made and rig by my self. 

Gameplay Instructions
In Game Menu Check Controls before playing the game
